Package org.timepedia.chronoscope.client.browser.flashcanvas

Interface Summary
FlashResources  
 

Class Summary
FlashCanvas An implementation of Canvas that creates a CANVAS tag per Layer, as well as using DIVs and images to render text on the CANVAS
FlashCanvasPattern  
FlashLayer An implementation of the Layer interface using the Safari/WHATWG Javascript CANVAS.
FlashLinearGradient  
FlashLinearGradient.FlashColorStop  
FlashRadialGradient Stubbed out for now, implement later.
FlashView A realization of a View on the browser using a Flash helper based on ASCanvas
